backend/main.mo: Main backend actor that manages games and videos with CRUD operations, using blob storage for images and providing query/update methods for retrieving and adding content.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping five main features (homepage, games showcase, videos section, about page, contact section) to their implementing files, components, and test IDs with high confidence ratings.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON object containing one-sentence summaries of all frontend files including components, pages, hooks, and configuration files for the Ryuuk Gaming application.
frontend/index.css: Global CSS with Tailwind layers defining OKLCH color system variables for light and dark modes, featuring a gaming-themed palette with neutral grays and accent colors.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that sets up the root div and loads the React application via main.tsx module script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component configuring TanStack Router with five routes (Home, Games, Videos, About, Contact) all wrapped in a shared Layout component.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component with three-column layout displaying brand info, quick navigation links, social media icons, copyright notice, and Caffeine.ai attribution with UTM tracking.
frontend/src/components/GameCard.tsx: Game display card showing cover image with aspect ratio 3:4, title with gamepad icon, and description with hover effects and scale transitions.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Layout wrapper providing consistent page structure with sticky Navigation header, main content area with Outlet for route rendering, and Footer.
frontend/src/components/Navigation.tsx: Responsive navigation header with logo, desktop horizontal menu, mobile hamburger menu, and active route highlighting using TanStack Router state.
frontend/src/components/SocialLinks.tsx: Reusable component rendering YouTube, Twitch, X, and Discord social media icons with brand-specific hover colors and external link attributes.
frontend/src/components/VideoCard.tsx: Video card component displaying thumbnail with play button overlay on hover, title, description, and external link button to watch content.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous actor for backend communication using Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useGames.ts: React Query hook that fetches all games from the backend actor, enabled only when the actor is available.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context and provider component with login/logout functionality, identity management, and status tracking using DFINITY's AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useVideos.ts: React Query hook that fetches all videos from the backend actor, enabled only when the actor is available.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS with Tailwind imports, custom CSS variables for theming (light/dark modes), custom scrollbar styling, and typography configuration using Inter and Rajdhani fonts.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query client, Internet Identity provider, and renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/About.tsx: About page component displaying Ryuuk Gaming's story, mission, values, and community focus with styled sections and icons.
frontend/src/pages/Contact.tsx: Contact page component displaying social media platforms (YouTube, Twitch, X, Discord) with links and descriptions for community engagement.
frontend/src/pages/Games.tsx: Games page component that displays a grid of featured games fetched via useGames hook, with loading, error, and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Homepage component featuring a hero section with background image, call-to-action buttons for games and videos, and a features section highlighting console gaming focus, quality content, and community engagement.
frontend/src/pages/Videos.tsx: Videos page component that fetches and displays gaming videos in a grid layout with loading, error, and empty states using the useVideos hook and VideoCard component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom OKLCH color system, gaming-themed design tokens including glow effects, custom fonts (Inter and Rajdhani), and animation keyframes for accordions and pulse effects.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking Ryuuk Gaming website features including homepage, games showcase, videos section, about section, contact/community section, and gaming-themed dark mode design with specified image requirements.
